name: Gods Must Die
description:
This is the Demo for Gods Must Die, i worked on this game alongside my good friend Martin

We made this project while we both were Interns at Megapop(a game studio based in oslo): https://www.megapopgames.com/

The entire game was made in one month, and we used assets used from Unreal Marketplace

Martin Ofoghi: Game & Gameplay design, aswell as all of the programming

Håvard Wullum: Level, enviroment & Game Design

Please check out Martin Ofoghi: https://www.linkedin.com/in/m-ofoghi/ 

Please check out me: 

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/h%C3%A5va... 

Email: hawullum@gmail.com
